Get names of all variables appearing in a term

Source: R/formula_advanced.R
term_variables.Rd

Get names of all variables appearing in a term

term_variables(term)

Arguments

term

an object of class lgpterm

Value

a list of variable names

See also

Other advanced formula parsers: parse_expr(), parse_formula_advanced(), parse_rhs(), parse_term(), rhs_variables()
